properties.description: The Helping Hands Hub has been running for just over 1 year. A warm space offering a place to meet new friends, have a warm snack and hot drink, seek advice from Citizens Advice, Adult Social Services, British Red Cross, Foodbank, Community Shop (food can be purchased at vastly reduced supermarket prices), Rehab Services, Tech Skills (assistance with computer/mobile phones) & more.......
properties.title: Hunstanton Helping Hands Hub

properties.address: Hunstanton Library, 12 - 14 Valentine Road, Hunstanton, Norfolk PE36 5EF
properties.description: Free hot drinks during staffed times, please see our Whatâ€™s On page or ask in the library for times: https://www.norfolk.gov.uk/libraries-local-history-and-archives/libraries/whats-on
properties.title: Hunstanton Library

properties.address: Hunstanton Methodist Church, Hunstanton, Norfolk PE36 6AJ
properties.description: Held in the warm Link area between the church and the hall, refreshments served, board games available. All welcome, whether you are part of a faith group or not. Currently we cater for adults but children's toys are available in the church. Well behaved dogs welcome. We have other activities on throughout the week
properties.title: Hunstanton Methodist Church Warm Wecome Space
